text: You are just crossing my patience
All I want to know just one thing
That you love me or not
Why the hell you are taking so long?
That boy is creating such nuisance…
Today they threw water on her face, tomorrow what is the guarantee that they won’t throw acid on her?
She is so scared, that she don’t even wish to go out from home
What to do ? My head is not working at all !
That will be great, it will help me reduce my anxiety
Ok, you look for a good University for her and enrol her
So that her education can be continued there and she will not fall behind
My daughter, you aunt asked me to take you to Dhaka at her place
But Father, how can I go leaving you all alone here ?
Listen my child, your aunt will love you, take care of you a lot
And I will regularly come and visit you
But who will look after you?
Your medicine, food and everything else ?
Listen, if you do not go to Dhaka, that lad Romiz will make you a mental patient
Why are you sitting down so sad ?
Ohho, come one have one, nothings gonna happen
Are you scared ? Look there is nothing to be scared
In my house you are safe
Ok then, I have to leave today
No, I have to return home tonight, I have some important work to do at home
So, what did you do about her admission?
Our neighbour Mr Rahman’s daughter goes to a good University
She said she will talk to her University regarding Orshi’s admission

Ok listen she has money for admission 
If needed I can send more
Will there be any problem for money ? Orshi is my daughter too
Ok then, I have to leave now
So that I can reach by evening
How can you stay there alone ?
I will come soon, soon I will come
What are you two have started ?
Hey, silly why are you greeting her like that?
Didn’t I tell you our neighbour Mr Rahman’s daughter?
I will admit you in her University
You two will go together, you will get a friend too !
Ok, you two talk to each other, let me bring some tea
Full name is Zannatul Ferdous Orshi
What happened ? Whats the matter with you ?
Orshi, my full name is Zannatul Ferdous Orshi
You are so … have some tea … crazy girl !
You are so simple and innocent
People suffers when they are innocent
I got it, I need to change your attitude
No, not possible. I am just fine
That’s why I told you, to go home early
Look now we can't get a single CNG ? Its so late now !
How will we go home now?
Oh come on don’t be so tensed
We will get one, just wait
Where is CNG ? None is here !!!
look I am really scared now
Oh come on we will get one …just wait
What’s the time now just look ? Whats the time ?
Oh my god, its so late, we have to go asap
Look I am really scared now !

How long will you hide away ? 
[laugh out in dramatic way]
Is it your hand or hammer ?
You could have ruined my face now !
What kind of prank is that ?
What if she has an heart failure ?
just saw you two wondering about for CNG perhaps
So thought of taking dramatic entry
Ok now lets go and drop us at home
By the way my name is Zarif
From now on this name will always echo around you again and again
I mean my entry was unique right ? is int it ?
Well,  may I know your full name Orshi ?
Her name is Zannatul Ferdous Orshi
Hmm.. ok please go on …get into the cng

Lets go
Come on ….there is no other cng
Hey, what's this ? let me in ! Why are you leaving me behind ?  Sushoma …
I was upset a little while ago ...

But now I am feeling good 
after seeing someone this morning !
Are you trying to say something to me?
I think you want my cell number ?
Something in your eyes, let me see !
Hey! Zannatul Ferdous Orshi, you here ?
Yes brother this is my campus ...
So, you are here ? don’t you have any work ?
No, just came to meet someone
Oh ok, brother, see you again then
Yes met, but what if that person offered me some tea ? How about that ?
What? You in my campus, means you came to meet me ….means…
Oh come on, stop mumbling, Its just a cup of tea !!!
Yes tea, why not, the canteen is on the other side
Do you do the same with everyone, brother ?
Do what with everyone? What did I do ?
No, like talking to girls in a bit romantic manner ?
So you think I look like that ?
I do with you, means I do with everyone else, right ?
Well, no but why with me ?
Because, before I never saw a perfect girl like you here

After you came, feels like 
a perfect girl came into this University
Don’t you have any work today?
Nothing my mum, not a word !
Ok, got to go, suddenly remembered some  work !
Just now you said, you don’t want to go !
No, I have to go now. Any problem with you ?
Too many laughter too many tears...
How long will you go for?
It's just for 2 weeks, I must go
And you know it’s a field trip can't avoid
I too feel like going to see my father
Ok, don’t be sad, vacations are coming
Don’t mingle with Zarif too much !
As a friend he is just fine, nothing more then that
Mingle but don’t get mingled up !
What do you mean by mingled up ?
Means as a friend he is nice, caring helpful
He is far away from these things
He just pass fun times with girls
So I am warning you, got it ?
I will mingle but not get mingled up !
Where did you get my number?
Listen, can’t you stop calling me brother?
You are senior to us, what else should I call you?
After Shushoma left didn’t see you for a while
Yes brother, I have exams coming up so a bit busy
Can you come outside in your veranda ?
I am in front of your home !
If she knows, I will be in trouble
Oh, come on .. please come out
Just want to see you once and leave
No, brother, what are you saying …
Can I come to your house?
No no no way have you gone mad ?
My aunt is at home, you just leave please
I feel like going far away with you in my bike !
Get lost somewhere, come on please
You say the same to everyone right ?
No, No …I am scared of bikes
Should I bring a car then?
No, why car? I don’t like car or bike
I used to ride cycle with my father when I was young
Its totally a different feeling when you ride a cycle under the open blue sky
Make paper boats and float them in the water
Can u come outside in your veranda ?
What is this? You really bought a cycle ?
Yes, our caretakers cycle, I borrowed from him
Why did you bother to get his cycle ?
Because you said you love cycle rides
I will ride this cycle with you
But I am not going to ride with you
Did anyone say anything about me to you ?
No no, why will someone tell me something about you
Ok fine you don’t have to go, ok
Why aren’t you taking the phone ?
A girl is very much concern for me !
So let the concern converts into Love
Then will take answer the call
She won’t give a call you will see
Didn’t I tell you ? she wont call back ?
You know what you talk too much
See,  didn’t I tell you she will call
I am bad boy ! Why did you call me?
How strange, when did I ever say that to you ?
I wanted to know how bad it is ?
Why do you want to know that ?
And I wanted to know… did I do any crime ?
Just for that I called ! That's all !
Can you really ride the cycle ?
Or you will you drop me ?
Well you cant see it here, But inside I have a big muscle
You think I will drop you ?
You got hurt in your foot !
How is it ? has the pain gone ?
To prove if I can ride or not you have to sit with me on the cycle, right ?
I am not that modern city girl !
So what you are actually looking for, won’t happen
Oh god! What ever you are thinking is nothing like that
I am glad that you could finally did take me close !
Can I tell you something honestly ?
After meeting you, I can feel you all the time…
It seems like you are just mixed with my every emotions….
Why are you crying ? Let me see ..
You didn’t call me for so long ?
I was busy with business …you see
Ok, meet me tomorrow at the University
What's up ? You became so beautiful ?
So, how was your life without me these few days ?
Talking about the devil and there he rings
Wait let me take the call
Zarif is ok for friendship but relationship no way !
well I don’t know how it all just happened!
Zarif will never take these seriously. Its just fun, time pass
As soon as the girl falls for him, he dumps, and find someone new

I have hang out with him for few weeks
I didn’t feel like that at all !
Look you don’t know Zarif very well

What he can do or does, 
you don’t know more then me Orshi
Look it doesn’t make any sense …
Why will you call him again ?
What kind of drama you are playing with Orshi ?
Why do you poke your nose so much?
Look you cant ruin a girl’s life like this
Tomorrow you tell her everything in details
It was hard for her to trust anyone

Now that she did trust someone, 
who will push her into fire
Ok, buddy, I will say no to her few days pass !
Oh, so you are not serious right ?
Do I need to take permission from you with whom to be serious or not?
Ok , cool down, I will call you later, bye
Why did he do this with me ? I will ask him !
I cant eat this anymore, its so spicy
Why did you order so spicy ?
I almost forgot, my friend Rashed was suppose to meet me here,  you go, I will come later
How could you do this to me ?
Come on … please don’t tell me
I don’t understand ! Why you all girls are so typical ?
I just went out with you few days … you think I am yours forever ?
Did I ever said I love, I cant live without you bla bla bla …
Please Orshi just grow up, wake up …
No, nothing just chit chatting with friends
Ok, then say bye to him, we will go out
Ok, will go say bye to him
I have to go now baby !
Tell me first, who is he ?
He is Rifat, CEO of Ahmed Group
He is giving me opportunity to do my internship in one his company branch based in London
You didn’t tell me anything about this before
I thought when everything becomes final I will tell you
But , why do you have to leave now ?
You know, you all have one problem
You always think something wrong in simple things
When did you became so cheap minded ?
I have to go, will talk at night
Just thought, you are starting a new life
possibility of joining a big company
So thought of giving you a treat !
oh, yes... I am on my way
Ok let me tell you, It's my birthday today
Oh really ! Happy Birthday to you!
But, baby I got to go !
Moreover the meeting is more important than your treat
Didn't you think of any other gift ?
Ok, no worry ! I will give this to my servant !
How long we will be in a relationship like this ?
You mean, you are thinking about our marriage ?
Oh, no honey ! I didn't come here to listen all these
Moreover I have my whole life in front of me, my carrier
I will be going to London, shortly with Rifat for my training !
Not at all thinking about wedding !
How come you became so backdated?
We are young, let's have fun and enjoy !
Forget about this marriage topic, Zarif !
I am not Orshi ! I am Hritika !
Why are you talking about getting married, like a typical village  boy ! Priceless moments and all those rubbish !
...and who the hell is Orshi ? The name sounds so cheap and typical ! Like a village girl !
I am a traditional village lad too ?
Do something ! You stay with your smart, dashing, whats his name ? Rifat !
Alright ! I can't do this anymore !
Just get lost, and don't even bother me anymore
I am happy that, you didn't like my gift and you will give this to your poor servant
She knows the value of  the scarf ! Not you !
Aunty, I am friend of Orshi ! Is she home ?
No, she is not here, went back to Comilla
I went to Orshi's aunt's home
Do you have her address in Comilla?
How will I know about that ?
and Orsh's chapter is close for you right ?
I am sorry, look I am even holding my ears !
I am not telling a lie, its no joke. I am very serious !
After she left, each and every moment I realised ...
It's important for me to meet her
I will ask for her forgiveness !
She was so hurt and was in pain !
Ok, I am texting you her address !
SMS me asap. I am on my way !

I am fine. My father will be angry, 
please go away from here !
It's true, I have realized it very late
Please stop telling me lies and make yourself more cheap !
I will stand and wait in front of your house !
You can do whatever you wish !
I have done a mistake once, not again and again
I will stay in front of your house
Until you trust me, I will stand in front of your house
I have heard about you from Orshi !
Because of you she was in pain and got hurt a lot !
You will sit here whole night and create a scene...
This is a small city. Everyone knows everybody else
Orshi will be talk of the town, will be bullied, at least I won't allow that to happen !
you go away from here and don't come here ever !
I just want to talk to her once
But Orshi don't want to talk to you !
I just want to hear this from her !
Didn't you hear what father said ?
Why are you still standing here ?
never ever come back here again !
Romiz is trying to kill someone !
Won't be able to come back
Trust me, I love you so much !
You won't go anywhere, you have to back for me
You have to come back for me
